description:
Blade has got cool ass eyes. His hair has some tint on it, and I thought it might look a bit funky, but ironically, his eyes match his hair. They are like cat's eye marbles, filled with every eye color available.
He's a lean machine with a thick dick. He likes to smile and you can tell he loves to laugh. Blade is also one of those dudes that actually got off on being filmed and seeing his dick on camera.
Does anyone else think he looks like Jude?
I like this guy. He's got a great attitude. I'm gonna try to get him back for more.
title: Blade - Solo
